div.h2: Inspiring and Empowering All Learners for Tomorrow's Challenges

div.p: Our programs of study range from core classes to college-prep advanced placement courses.
Athletics plays an important part in the lives of Fannett-Metal students, academically and socially.
Resources and downloadable forms for students and parents can be found here.

div.class: container-fluid nopadding hidden-xs hidden-sm visible-md visible-lg
